subject: Public Speaking
title: The Bystander Effect in Audiences
description: A quick win: understand The Bystander Effect in Audiences.

hook.text: Large audiences assume someone else will act. No one does.

buildup.text: Direct your call to action specifically to overcome this.

discovery.text: Instead of someone should, say each of you can.

twist.text: Personalizing calls to action defeats the bystander effect.

climax.text: Make each person feel personally responsible for action.

punchline.text: Make it personal. Beat the bystander effect.

quiz.question: How do you overcome the bystander effect?
